类 CsvUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ztman.tools.text.CsvUtil

  • public class CsvUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    从Jodd移植 https://github.com/oblac/jodd/blob/master/jodd-core/src/main/java/jodd/util/CsvUtil.java Helps with CSV strings. See: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma-separated_values
